name: tumblr - concealr
description: NOTE: As of 01.01.2013 this style will no longer be supported. No more need to spend time editing your screenshots for privacy. Enable this style and enter stealth mode. Removes all dashboard information, keeping your information private. Turns posts (except avatar pics) anonymous, removes footer tags, sidebar tags, counts...just take a look! Enable concealr, take your screenshot for the world to see, disable concealr then continue tumbring.
css: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);@-moz-document url-prefix('http://www.tumblr.com'), url-prefix('https://www.tumblr.com')  /*om.07.19.2011*/ {.count,.likes .hide_overflow,.tag .hide_overflow,.following .hide_overflow,.add_and_remove .hide_overflow,.post_info,.post_controls,.explore_more_tags,.footer_links.with_tags {visibility: hidden !important;}.likes:before{content:"tumblr - concealr userstyles.org" !important;font: bold small-caps .73em helevetica !important;margin-top: 0px !important;}.forever_alone {height: 38px !important;}.post_avatar, .post_info_fence{visibility: hidden !important;}.open_blog.with_subtitle a {color: rgba(0,0,0,0) !important;}/*donoteditthecredit*/}
